summary: ...just a preset for those who want their character to look like Laszoula
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][center]This is the preset made for the follower "Laszoula" by mfeile and me
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81944/?][img width=533,height=312]http://i.imgur.com/qc0EcD2.jpg[/img][/url][/center]


Required mods: SeveNBase Bombshell
                        KS Hairdos Renewal



Recommended Mods: WARNING! THESE ARE VERY IMPORTANT IF YOU WANT YOUR CHARACTER TO LOOK JUST LIKE MINE!!

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60769/?]Stoja's Warpaints
[/url][url=http://www.loverslab.com/files/file/3148-yevmods-makeup-pack-ymmp-2k-4k/]YMMP Makeup
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52841/?]Freckle Mania[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50032/?]KJ Tattoos [/url]Important if you want her soul (tattoos) to glow
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12253/?]Glowtastic[/url] If you want this blueish energy thing to sorround her
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76456/?]Runic Eyes[/url] If you want those glowing blue eyes
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81569/?]
Mud and Blood Plugin 
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81569/?][size=5](IMPORTANT I DO NOT HAVE PERMISSION TO UPLOAD THE PRESET WITH MUD AND BLOOD PLUGIN IF YOU WANT TO HAVE MUD AND BLOOD ON YOUR CHARACTER YOU HAVE TO ADJUST IT YOURSELF)
[/size][/url]


Installing: Look for another preset where manual installing is explained because I'm too lazy to explain it myself

Incompatibility: You may get problems when using another body mod then 7B

Credits: Frecklemania - tetrodoxin
            YMMP MAKEUP - yevvie
            Stoja's Warpaints - Veeblix
            KJ Tattoos - Khajiitas
            Runic Eyes - Mari
[/size]
author: Mythocs
